unnormalised: The IMD (India Meteorological Department) has issued an orange alert for Kerala, expecting heavy rainfall on 27/07/2024. The advisory indicates potential flooding in low-lying areas.
normalised: The I-M-D (India Meteorological Department) has issued an orange alert for Kerala, expecting heavy rainfall on twenty seventh july two thousand and twenty four. The advisory indicates potential flooding in low-lying areas.

unnormalised: Mumbai experienced a high of 32°C on 26/07/2024, with humidity levels reaching 85%. The forecast predicts intermittent showers throughout the weekend, specifically from 2 PM to 6 PM.
normalised: Mumbai experienced a high of thirty two degree celsius on twenty sixth july two thousand and twenty four, with humidity levels reaching eighty five percent. The forecast predicts intermittent showers throughout the weekend, specifically from two P-M to six P-M.

unnormalised: Delhi residents can expect a partly cloudy sky on 28/07/2024. The temperature is likely to range between 28°C and 35°C. Sunrise will be at 05:50 AM and sunset at 07:10 PM.
normalised: Delhi residents can expect a partly cloudy sky on twenty eighth july two thousand and twenty four. The temperature is likely to range between twenty eight degree celsius and thirty five degree celsius. Sunrise will be at zero five fifty A-M and sunset at zero seven ten P-M.

unnormalised: Guwahati is bracing for thunderstorms on 29/07/2024. The weather report suggests a 70% chance of precipitation, starting approximately at 11:00 AM. Citizens are advised to stay indoors during the storm.
normalised: Guwahati is bracing for thunderstorms on twenty ninth july two thousand and twenty four. The weather report suggests a seventy percent chance of precipitation, starting approximately at eleven zero zero A-M. Citizens are advised to stay indoors during the storm.
